title: Silent Knight
description: I went looking for answers — and found my heart instead.The days in Polar Bear, Alaska, are short and chilly. And the nights. Well, they’re long and frigid. The small, isolated town known for its yearly icy swim is overflowing with hunky, lonely men. These Mountain Men are waiting for their special soulmate to come along and heat things up.This December, take the plunge with nine of your favorite Instalove authors as we introduce you to your new Mountain Man book boyfriends.
author: Evie Mitchell
